nodes.text: The P'frorin system was a star system that was located within the Bheriz sector, a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. The system was home to the creature known as P'frorin gotta-worm.
The P'frorin system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square U-10.
